results.title: On-treatment analysis of the Improved Reduction of Outcomes: Vytorin Efficacy International Trial (IMPROVE-IT).
results.text_hl: METHODS: We evaluated 17,706 @<m>DISEASE_Stress_Disorders_Post_Traumatic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013313 @@@post-ACS@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ from the IMPROVE-IT trial who had low-density lipoprotein cholesterol values between 50 and 125 mg/dL and who received @CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069438 @@@Ez@@@ 10 mg/d with @CHEMICAL_Sulfur @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013455 @@@S@@@ 40 mg/d (@CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069438 @@@Ez@@@/@CHEMICAL_Sulfur @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013455 @@@S@@@) or placebo with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ 40 mg/d (@CHEMICAL_Phosphorus @CHEMICAL_MESH:D010758 @@@P@@@/@CHEMICAL_Sulfur @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013455 @@@S@@@).

citations.NLM: Blazing MA, Giugliano RP, de Lemos JA, Cannon CP, Tonkin A, Ballantyne CM, Lewis BS, Musliner TA, Tershakovec AM, Lokhnygina Y, White JA, Reist C, McCagg A, Braunwald E. On-treatment analysis of the Improved Reduction of Outcomes: Vytorin Efficacy International Trial (IMPROVE-IT). Am Heart J. 2016 Dec;182():89-96. PMID: 27914504
